Package au.edu.anu.twapps.mm.layout

Class RT2Layout

java.lang.Object
au.edu.anu.twapps.mm.layout.RT2Layout
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILayout
public class RT2Layout extends Object implements ILayout
Author:
Ian Davies - 1 May 2020

Creates radial tree layout similar to RT1Layout but with vertices of the same depth on the same circle. Circle radius increase with depth.

Yee, K.P., Fisher, D., Dhamija, R. and Hearst, M., 2001, October. Animated exploration of graphs with radial layout. In Proc. IEEE InfoVis 2001 (pp. 43-50).

  • Constructor Details

    • RT2Layout

      public RT2Layout​(VisualNode rootNode, boolean includeParentChildEdges, boolean includeCrossLinksEdges, boolean sideline)
      Parameters:
      rootNode - VisualNode to use as the layout root (need not be World node).
      includeParentChildEdges - Use parent-child relationships.
      includeCrossLinksEdges - Show cross-link edges
      sideline - Move isolated vertices to one side.
